H0.text: What is the medical description of the loss of hair from the head or body, sometimes to the extent of baldness. Alopecia

H1.text: What is the medical description of the loss of hair from the head or body, sometimes to the extent of baldness. Hypotrichosis

H2.text: What is the medical description of the loss of hair from the head or body, sometimes to the extent of baldness. Effluvium

H3.text: What is the medical description of the loss of hair from the head or body, sometimes to the extent of baldness. Bald

A4.text: Hair loss, also known as alopecia or baldness, refers to a loss of hair from part of the head or body.

A5.text: Hypotrichosis is a condition of abnormal hair patterns, predominantly loss or reduction.
